actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-941.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 402(a)of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 2937, a bill to amend the Speedy Trial Act of 1974 to provide further authorization for appropriations for pretrial services agencies.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S2937 (Presidential services agencies funding).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 402(a)of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 2937, a bill to amend the Speedy Trial Act of 1974 to provide further authorization for appropriations for pretrial services agencies.
